programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Królowie złomu
programme.desc: W Londynie trzeba przerwać rozbiórkę sześciopiętrowego biurowca, w którym znaleziono azbest. W Lytham St Annes problemem okazują się spadające dachówki.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.desc: Kapitan Squizzy ciężko pracuje, aby zrealizować zamówienie na 200 kilogramów homarów. Kapitan Warren ma już 300 kilo dużych, czerwonych homarów — ale dobra passa nie będzie trwała wiecznie.

programme.title: W złej sprawie
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Kartel z monitoringiem i gang Stopwatch
programme.desc: Wyczyny Jeffreya Manchestera, który uciekł z więzienia i potem się ukrywał. Kulisy włamania do Zielonej Krypty na zamku w Dreźnie i pokonania przez sprytny gang nowoczesnego systemu ochrony.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Steve walczy z zalanymi drogami; jego ciężarówka psuje się w najgorszym możliwym miejscu. Napięcie rośnie, gdy początkująca Danyelle otrzymuje lekcję jazdy od swojego męża.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Vern z ekipy Dirt Dogs marzy o znalezieniu bogatego złoża. Scrappers są wreszcie gotowi do uruchomienia swojej maszynerii. Ted i Lecky szukają złota na historycznym złomowisku.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Prowadzą największe samochody ciężarowe po najtrudniejszych drogach i najbardziej pustych autostradach na świecie: poznajmy australijskich kierowców ciężarówek!

programme.desc: Kapitan Squizzy ciężko pracuje, aby zrealizować zamówienie na 200 kilogramów homarów. Kapitan Warren ma już 300 kilo dużych, czerwonych homarów — ale dobra passa nie będzie trwała wiecznie.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australi S6 Ep9
programme.desc: Bracia Bennett z Tasmanii, zajmujący się wycinką drzew, pokonują leśne ścieżki, aby przenieść ogromną wyciągarkę. Woody ma dostarczyć mrożonki, ale jego chłodnia przecieka.

programme.title: Największe pomyłki inżynierów
programme.desc: Eksplozja wstrząsa miasteczkiem West w Teksasie; eksperci wykorzystują najnowsze osiągnięcia naukowe do zbadania sprawy. Okazuje się, że do wybuchu doszło w pobliskiej fabryce nawozów sztucznych.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Ted z ekipy Mahoneys zatrudnia historyka, aby zrozumieć tajemnicze znalezisko. Rick wraca do pracy znacznie wcześniej, niż zalecał mu lekarz. Gold Gypsies robią, co mogą, aby zrealizować swój cel.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S1 Ep2
programme.desc: W Perth samotny kierowca ciężarówki Steve Grahame przygotowuje się do wielkiej wyprawy: liczącej 3 tys. kilometrów drogi na północ Australii Zachodniej.

programme.title: Królowie złomu
programme.desc: Betonowo-stalowy pomost runął, powodując poważne problemy w Jersey. Rozbiórka starego garażu nie zajmie dużo czasu — Król Złomu zdąży dojechać swoim bentleyem na ślub i wesele.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.desc: Clive, kapitan kutra Minnamurra, musi postarać się o dobry początek połowów, jeśli chce osiągnąć zyski. W Cieśninie Bassa kapitan Danny używa echosondy, aby znajdować homary.

programme.title: Największe pomyłki inżynierów
programme.desc: Eksplozja wstrząsa miasteczkiem West w Teksasie; eksperci wykorzystują najnowsze osiągnięcia naukowe do zbadania sprawy. Okazuje się, że do wybuchu doszło w pobliskiej fabryce nawozów sztucznych.

programme.title: William i Kate - rok później
programme.desc: 29 kwietnia 2011 roku William i Catherine pobrali się na bajkowym ślubie, który obejrzało ponad dwa miliardy ludzi i który świętował cały świat.

programme.title: Maxima Królowa Niderlandów
programme.desc: Praca wydaje się być szyta na miarę dla Máximy. Pierwsza Dama Holandii i Specjalna Rzecznik Sekretarza Generalnego ONZ ds. „Inkluzywnego finansowania rozwoju”. Jako ekonomistka pracuje nad zapewnieniem biednym ludziom dostępu do usług finansowych, lepszej ochrony konsumentów i większej edukacji finansowej. Spotyka się z wpływowymi osobistościami ze świata polityki i biznesu, aby posunąć tę kwestię do przodu. Jego harmonogram jest ściśle określony, nie ma dwóch takich samych dni. Wyzwanie dla mamy trójki dzieci.

programme.title: Diana - wywiad, który wstrząsnał światem
programme.desc: 20 listopada 1995 r. BBC Panorama wyemitowała informację stulecia. Szczery wywiad z księżną Dianą, w którym złamała wszelkie protokoły, obnażając traumy i skandale życia w domu królewskim. 25 lat później film ten ukazuje, jak zorganizowano transmitowane w telewizji wydarzenie stulecia, co wywiad ujawnił na temat współczesnego społeczeństwa, a także nowe spojrzenie na psychologiczny portret samej Diany, naiwnej młodej kobiety, która wierzyła w bajkę o swoim małżeństwie tylko po to, by stracić poczucie siebie w swojej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Kate - Droga do Bycia Nowoczesną Królową
programme.desc: Łącząc niezwykłe materiały filmowe i wywiady z ekspertami, ten autorski dokument przedstawia prawdziwą historię Kate Middleton, pozornie zwyczajnej młodej kobiety, której przeznaczeniem stało się zostać królową Anglii. Pochodząca ze stosunkowo skromnych warunków rodzina Middleton nie mogła bardziej różnić się od rodziny królewskiej. Jednak właśnie tego chciał William - królewskiego życia połączonego z wygodną stabilnością małżeńską i kontynuacją łatwiejszych relacji z Brytyjczykami, zapoczątkowanych przez jego matkę, Dianę.

programme.title: Król Jerzy VI - Niespodziewany Sukces
programme.desc: King's Speech to opowieść o człowieku, który przezwyciężył własne słabości dla dobra narodu. Kiedy jego starszy brat, Edward VIII, zrzeka się tronu, by poślubić Wallis Simpson, nerwowo zachowujący się następca, Jerzy "Bertie" VI, jest nękany nieśmiałością i wadą wymowy podczas przemawiania do swoich poddanych. Jest to prawdziwa historia introwertycznego i skromnego człowieka, którego wydarzenia i okoliczności sprawiły, że stał się inspiracją dla narodu brytyjskiego podczas wojny z hitlerowskimi Niemcami.

programme.title: Królowa Danii - Prywatne życie
programme.desc: Królowa Małgorzata obchodziła swoje 80. urodziny w 2020 roku - to doskonała okazja, aby przyjrzeć się bardziej nieformalnej stronie Jej Królewskiej Mości i dowiedzieć się więcej o jej zainteresowaniach sztuką, kulturą i historią.

programme.title: Książe Harry - Ten Drugi
programme.desc: Jeśli Pałac myślał, że rok 2023 będzie spokojniejszy po dramacie i tragedii z 2022 roku, to wydanie autobiografii księcia Harry'ego Spare prawie zniszczyło wszelkie nadzieje. Książka wywołała międzynarodowy szał wśród mediów i opinii publicznej. Opinia jest teraz bardziej podzielona niż kiedykolwiek na temat tego, czy książę Harry powinien zachować swoje królewskie tytuły. Chociaż Harry i Meghan uciekli z rodziny królewskiej, aby mieć drugą szansę na prywatne życie, którego zawsze pragnęli, świat nie pozwolił im odejść po cichu. Pomimo ich ucieczki, ciągła uwaga mediów spowodowała lawinę nagłówków, rozpalając plotki po skandalicznych plotkach na temat pary i rodziny królewskiej. Aby...

programme.title: Kobiety, które tworzyły historię - Elżbieta I - Poślubiona Anglii
programme.desc: W epoce zdominowanej przez mężczyzn królowa Elżbieta I była jedyną kobietą. Rządziła Anglią przez 45 lat, kładąc podwaliny pod Imperium Brytyjskie, a kiedy zmarła w 1603 roku, nadała imię całej epoce: epoce elżbietańskiej.

programme.title: Harry i Meghan - wielka przepaść
programme.desc: Harry i Meghan uciekli z rodziny królewskiej, aby mieć drugą szansę na prywatne życie, którego zawsze pragnęli. Ale pomimo ich ucieczki świat wciąż opowiadał i powtarzał ich historię.

programme.title: Korona Szwecji
programme.desc: Król Karol Gustaw objął rządy pod tym hasłem. Równouprawnienie od dawna jest dla szwedzkiej rodziny królewskiej ważną wartością. W 1980 r. zmieniono prawo dotyczące dziedziczenia tronu i wprowadzono równe prawa do dziedziczenia dla mężczyzn i kobiet. Małżeństwa ze „zwykłymi ludźmi" również stały się tradycją. Szwedzkie dzieci królewskie mogą poślubić kogokolwiek zechcą. Sam król dał przykład, poślubiając Silvię Sommerlath z Heidelbergu w 1976 roku.

programme.title: Rodzina Grimaldich: szlachectwo zobowiązuje
programme.desc: Książęca rodzina z Monako, ze swoim przepychem, nieszczęściami i skandalami, od dziesięcioleci znajduje się w centrum uwagi mediów. Luksus, odrzutowce i hazard - rodzina Grimaldi otacza się blichtrem i przepychem jak żadna inna arystokratyczna dynastia w Europie.

programme.title: Następca Tronu Danii
programme.desc: Co to znaczy dorastać ze świadomością, że nigdy nie będzie się w stanie wybrać własnej kariery? Jak zdefiniować siebie w świecie, który ma już krystalicznie czysty obraz tego, kim jesteś i kim będziesz?

programme.title: Królowa Elżbieta II - Życie w służbie
programme.desc: Królowa Elżbieta II: Życie w służbie - Elżbieta II: szósta królowa i 63. władczyni Wielkiej Brytanii.

programme.title: Król Karol III: Nowa Era
programme.desc: Królowa Elżbieta II nie żyje. Zachodzi słońce nad drugą wielką erą Elżbiety. Książę Walii wstępuje na tron i zostaje królem Karolem III. Nastała nowa era; panuje nowoczesna monarchia. W nigdy wcześniej nie widzianym wywiadzie, były kamerdyner króla Karola, Grant Harrold, obecnie sensacja mediów społecznościowych, maluje intymny portret nowego monarchy, dając wgląd w człowieka, który zostanie koronowany na króla w pierwszej koronacji od 70 lat. W wywiadzie z redaktorem naczelnym Majesty Magazine i płodnym królewskim biografem, Ingrid Seward opisuje poruszające momenty odejścia królowej, będąc świadkiem z pierwszej ręki niektórych z najbardziej historycznych momentów w najnowszej historii...

programme.title: Boska para - Bhumibol i Sirikit z Tajlandii
programme.desc: Stoi na czele Tajlandii od ponad 60 lat. Przetrwał 26 rządów i kilkanaście zamachów stanu: Król Bhumibol Wielki. Kiedy się pojawia, wszyscy Tajowie natychmiast padają przed nim na kolana. Krytyka króla jest tabu i jest ścigana jako lèse majesté. Jego żona, Sirikit, sprawiła, że dawny Syjam stał się znany jako najpiękniejsze królestwo na świecie. W rozmowach z członkami rodziny, powiernikami i doświadczonymi obserwatorami życia dworu, autorom filmu udaje się ostrożnie zbliżyć do nietykalnego władcy i odważnie zajrzeć za pałacowe mury. W pięknych ujęciach film opowiada o ludzkich tragediach, kryzysach politycznych i bezwarunkowym oddaniu.

programme.title: Joanna d'Arc - Wyzwolicielka Francji
programme.desc: Joanna d'Arc – Wyzwolicielka Francji – Pierwsza kobieta, która przeszła do historii zachodniej cywilizacji. Wierzyła, że ma boską misję i uratowała Francję w mrocznych dniach wojny stuletniej. Dziewczyna z ludu, która przeciwstawiła się wszystkim instytucjom swoich czasów.

programme.title: Królewskie Klejnoty: Odkryte Dziedzictwo
programme.desc: Historia historycznego zestawu rubinów noszonego przez księżną Marię z Danii, stworzonego na koronację Napoleona w 1804 roku. Rubinowy zestaw przeszedł przez różne dynastie i trafił do Danii w 1869 roku. Maria ożywiła tę spuściznę, nosząc go na swoim ślubie w 2004 roku. Zestaw, podobnie jak inne klejnoty królewskie, przetrwał i symbolizuje królewską godność i historię.

programme.title: Niezwykłe życie księcia Filipa
programme.desc: To nowy i wyrazisty portret człowieka, który często był przedmiotem sprzecznych opinii - a jednak jest najpopularniejszym członkiem rodziny królewskiej wśród pracowników Pałacu Buckingham, którzy kochają go i uważają za "człowieka z ludu".

programme.title: Harry i Meghan - współczesny romans królewski
programme.desc: Poznaj nową parę królewską i jej otoczenie, śledząc ich historię od początku ich romansu do ogłoszenia zaręczyn i odkryj, jak amerykańska aktorka wkrótce zostanie członkiem brytyjskiej rodziny królewskiej.

programme.title: Królowa Danii - EP 1
programme.desc: W ciągu ostatnich 50 lat Królowa Danii Małgorzata II spotkała się z niezliczoną liczbą zagranicznych głów państw. W tej wyjątkowej serii dokumentalnej kilku z nich dzieli się swoimi wspomnieniami i spotkaniami z królową w ciągu ostatnich 50 lat.

programme.title: Królowa Danii - EP 2
programme.desc: W ciągu ostatnich 50 lat Królowa Danii Małgorzata II spotkała się z niezliczoną liczbą zagranicznych głów państw. W tej wyjątkowej serii dokumentalnej kilku z nich dzieli się swoimi wspomnieniami i spotkaniami z królową w ciągu ostatnich 50 lat.

programme.title: Cienie i Blaski Mody
programme.desc: Wielkie nazwiska w modzie wybierają Chińczyków. Przybywają oni tutaj w coraz większej liczbie i mają znaczący wpływ na lokalną gospodarkę. Nasze badania nad Europą i Doliną Mody pokazują, że za kulisami stosuje się każdą sztuczkę, aby zwiększyć zyski - od luk podatkowych po system outsourcingu, w którym produkcja jest zlecana chińskim Włochom pracującym w niedopuszczalnych warunkach. Rozczarowane spojrzenie na wielkie marki.

programme.title: Szwajcaria i krypto rewolucja
programme.desc: Trzymający w napięciu dokument o kryptowalucie w Szwajcarii: Szwajcaria i krypto rewolucja. Jak odrodzą się banki i rządy?

programme.title: Niechybny Koniec. Jak pieniądze straciły swoją wartość.
programme.desc: Wall Street jest okupowana. Europa wali się na siebie. Na całym świecie ludzie są ogarnięci strachem i gniewem, a jedno pytanie jest na ustach wszystkich: Czy kryzys finansowy się skończył, czy też zmierzamy w kierunku gospodarczej katastrofy? End of the Road to film dokumentalny, który jest kroniką globalnego krachu finansowego.

programme.title: Modowi Giganci
programme.desc: Dokument przedstawia sylwetki wybitnych postaci przemysłu modowego i finansowe aspekty tegoż biznesu.

programme.title: Marketing Mesjasza
programme.desc: Jak dużo *naprawdę* wiesz o tym, jak zaczęło się chrześcijaństwo? Bez względu na to, czy jesteś chrześcijaninem, ateistą, czy członkiem innego wyznania, nie sposób zignorować wpływu, jaki chrześcijaństwo wywarło na zachodnią cywilizację.

programme.title: Magiczne Pieniądze - Rewolucja Bitcoina
programme.desc: Magiczne Pieniądze to film dokumentalny, który bada tajemnicze pochodzenie Bitcoina, jego rolę w społeczeństwie oraz to, w jaki sposób może on kształtować przyszłość naszego świata.

programme.title: Giganci Techniki
programme.desc: Giganci Techniki w wersji z polskim lektorem. W tym dokumencie opowiadamy historie ludzi biznesu, którzy zmienili świat.

programme.title: Bitcoin: Poza bańką
programme.desc: Wraz z pojawieniem się Bitcoin, pierwszej na świecie waluty cyfrowej, po raz pierwszy w historii pieniądze nie są już kontrolowane przez banki lub rządy, ale przez ludzi, którzy ich używają.

programme.title: Bitcoin - Koniec Pieniądza Który Wszyscy Znamy
programme.desc: Bitcoin: Koniec pieniądza, który wszyscy znamy śledzi historię pieniądza od społeczeństw barterowych starożytnego świata do parkietów giełdowych Wall St. Dokument demaskuje praktyki banków centralnych i podejrzanych aktorów finansowych, którzy rzucili świat na kolana w czasie ostatniego kryzysu. Podkreśla wpływ rządu na proces kreacji pieniądza i to, w jaki sposób powoduje on inflację. Co więcej, film ten wyjaśnia, jak większość pieniędzy, którymi się dziś posługujemy, jest tworzona z powietrza przez banki, gdy kreują one dług. Epicki w zakresie, ten film bada wzorce innowacji technologicznych i kwestionuje wszystko, co myślałeś, że wiesz o pieniądzach. Czy Bitcoin jest alternatywą dla...

programme.title: Aborygeni: mroczny sekret Australii
programme.desc: UTOPIA to film ujawniający, że apartheid jest głęboko zakorzeniony w przeszłości i teraźniejszości Australii, a Aborygeni nadal żyją w skrajnym ubóstwie i warunkach jak w krajach trzeciego świata. Mają niską średnią długością życia i nieproporcjonalnie wysoki wskaźnik zgonów w aresztach policyjnych.

programme.title: Światowy Rynek Sztuki
programme.desc: Światowy rynek sztuki jest warty 67,8 miliarda dolarów. To ekosystem skrajności charakteryzujący się głębokimi strukturami władzy, rynek próżności, mitów i hipizmu, znajdujący się w rękach kilku wpływowych graczy. Za błyszczącą fasadą królują nierówność i konkurencja. Industrializacja od lat 90. XX wieku, przyspieszyła handel dziełami sztuki i zglobalizowała zbiorowy gust, ale sam rynek sztuki pozostaje w dużej mierze nieprzejrzysty. Dlaczego? Jak funkcjonuje światowy rynek sztuki? Kto ustala ceny? Jak działają domy aukcyjne i galerie? Dlaczego super bogaci inwestują w sztukę, co tak naprawdę dostają artyści oraz jak Internet wpływa na handel dziełami sztuki? Zespół kanału Moconomy...

programme.title: Zmierzch Yakuzy
programme.desc: Czym jest Yakuza? Czy to rak narodu czy zło konieczne w kraju o jednym z najniższych wskaźników przestępczości w uprzemysłowionym świecie?

programme.title: Token - przyszłość systemu ekonomicznego
programme.desc: Świat finansów podlega ciągłym zmianom. Wraz z postępem cyfryzacji w XXI wieku proces ten gwałtownie przyspieszył i otworzył nowe możliwości myślenia o finansach.

programme.title: Dark Web - Boom na czarnym rynku
programme.desc: Internet ma swoją ciemną stronę, o której istnieniu prawdopodobnie nawet nie wiemy. Za pozytywną powłoką mediów społecznościowych, aplikacji komunikacyjnych i platform, które uczyniły nasze życie łatwiejszym i zbliżyły do siebie, znajdziemy przestępców wykorzystujących te same aplikacje i platformy do prowadzenia nielegalnych i niebezpiecznych działań.

programme.title: Jak narzucają nam styl życia
programme.desc: Życie to wybór. To, co jemy, co czytamy, kogo wybieramy; każdego dnia dokonujemy tysięcy wyborów, które określają jak chcemy żyć. A jeśli możliwość wyboru jest tylko iluzją?

programme.title: Amerykańskie Państwo Nadzoru
programme.desc: Film ten analizuje obecny stan inwigilacji w Stanach Zjednoczonych. Czy prywatność jest przestarzałą fantazją? Czy mamy przyzwyczaić się do myśli, że ktoś nas ciągle obserwuje?

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: The defense serves notice: This is not going to be business as usual.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E33 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Harry Beck thought he was doing the right thing when he agreed to talk to his brother Dave's on-again off-again girlfriend Kimberly Passwaters about their relationship.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: It is time to upsize! Daryl's client is moving away from downtown Toronto because they desire a bigger space, more privacy, & tranquility. They have 3 children between the ages of 7 & 13 who need their own bedrooms & the lady of the house needs an office since she works from home. Daryl knows all about tranquility & goes golfing with Mike to discuss his client & Mike's listing for them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jin's client lives a very active & busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business & pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent

With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent

Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: A man on a late-night bike ride is stopped by officers for not having a headlamp. A suspect in a domestic dispute admits to hitting a woman. A man doesn’t deal with being laughed at by his neighbor in a peaceful way.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two brothers after an attempted bank robbery. A confused man with a shotgun calls police after hearing voices. A man asks deputies for a break after they find illegal items in his truck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A sibling calls authorities when his belligerent brother refuses to leave. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a grocery store. Officers investigate a suspicious vehicle at a local gas station.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed pursuit ends in a foot chase. Stolen property is found in a suspect’s car during a traffic stop. An altercation ends with a brick being tossed at a victim’s car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers in Las Vegas make an arrest in a grand theft auto call with the help of the K9 unit. An uncooperative driver takes off in the middle of a traffic stop. A woman in Florida is rewarded for her honesty and is let go as her friends are arrested.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies assist border patrol in pursuit of a vehicle that has blown checkpoint and its tires. A drunk woman is pulled over not knowing she is missing a tire.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An out-of-control woman needs to be subdued after an arrest. Deputies spot an erratic driver who appears to be under the influence. A car is seen driving backwards on a one-way street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An Officer attempts to pull over a car which leads to a high speed pursuit. An Officer encounters an apartment fire. A man is hit by a vehicle in a trailer park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman stuffs drugs into her under garments. A mother attacks her daughter because she got married in Vegas. Officers are called when a woman is accused of stalking her friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A Special Operations Unit coordinates a city-wide “buy-bust” sting designed to apprehend dealers. Officers join units in pursuit of a stolen SUV. An officer arrests brothers for public intoxication.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A sting operation is set up to catch narcotics dealers. A man flees a restaurant without paying his four-hundred-dollar tab. A traffic stop for a tint violation leads to a felony arrest for narcotics.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman attempting to run over her boyfriend is arrested on multiple charges. A knife-wielding suspect is arrested in connection to a home invasion. A life is saved in response to a 911-hang-up call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man with a knife tries to evade police by hiding in bushes. Vice Unit Officers conduct a prostitution sting. When Officers are shot at during a pursuit, the woman claims it was flashes from a camera.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect bites an Officer while trying to avoid arrest. An Officer responds to a stabbing. An Officer is flagged down by a concerned group looking for a missing 4-year-old.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An enraged pregnant woman attempts to run over her partner. A handcuffed man’s efforts to escape police end in a faceplant. A lying fugitive’s identity is revealed via a fingerprint scanner.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A dispute inside a nightclub turns into a street fight. A man patrols his neighborhood ‘Old West’ style. A K-9 unit is called in to track a burglar on the run.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man in New Jersey is arrested for possession. A couple is pulled over while looking to score. A routine traffic stop turns into a fruitful drug bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect in a traffic stop decides to handle the situation by screaming at the police. Officers have a close encounter with a suspect who admits that he has hidden contraband. A man’s clothing choices tip police off to possible criminal behavior.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A remorseful woman is arrested for lewd conduct during Mardi Gras. Officers are dispatched into the busy streets of New Orleans during the super bowl. Officers investigates a theft at a local store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E35 Crooked as a Fish Hook
programme.desc: A reverse drug operation proves successful for officers in both Tampa, FL and Palm Beach County, FL. Officers are in search of a suspect responsible for burglary.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed pursuit quickly comes to a head after the driver loses control. A Florida man driving a stolen vehicle claims it belongs to his parents. Arrests are made in a Florida prostitute sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police investigate a possible abduction at a trailer park. A man in a stolen truck is pulled over and Officers discover washed checks and drug paraphernalia. A suspect is arrested after abandoning a stolen vehicle behind a fast food restaurant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A police chase becomes more dangerous when the hood of a stolen vehicle flips open. A purse snatcher denies robbing a woman. A limping man with a knee injury denies crashing his car into a tree.

programme.title: Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego gadżety na ratunek! Gdy mieszkańcy Car City potrzebują pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: Tom's Garage
programme.desc: Tom the Tow Truck pomaga swoim przyjaciołom z Car City, gdy ci potrzebują naprawy. Zawsze daje im coś specjalnego po każdej pracy.

programme.title: Tom's Paint Shop
programme.desc: Zatrzymaj się w warsztacie Toma Holownika! Ten kreatywny malarz z radością ulepszy i nada swoim przyjaciołom nowy, świeży wygląd.

programme.title: AnimaCars Discovery
programme.desc: Poznaj Jonny'ego Toolboxa i AnimaCars i dołącz do ich licznych misji ratunkowych, aby przywrócić spokój w Animatown!

programme.title: Car Patrol
programme.desc: Wszyscy w Samochodzikowie troszczą się o siebie nawzajem. Patrol to specjalny zespół, który dba o bezpieczeństwo mieszkańców.

programme.desc: Zespół budowlany buduje Samochodzikowo cegła po cegle! Pokazują, że wszystko jest możliwe z pomocą naszych przyjaciół.

programme.desc: Odkryjmy liczby, litery, kolory i kształty poprzez zabawne i ekscytujące zadania na świeżym powietrzu z załogą AnimaCars!

programme.desc: 50 of the very best feel-good summer hits. Each was a Top 10 smash across June, July & August in the '70s - on the beach, on your transistor radio, and at the big Radio 1 Roadshow!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes from the year Richard Nixon left the US Presidency after Watergate, Prog Rock dominated the album charts & inflation hit double digits. Imagine that!

programme.title: Seven Inch Heroes! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 50 songs from the cooler end of the 70s spectrum - designed for repeated plays! From Free to The Police via Thin Lizzy, The Clash & Lene Lovich.

programme.title: Punk & Disorderly!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s songs the cool kids were listening to in the latter half of the decade - expect skinny jeans, safety pins, guitars and just a few snarls!

programme.title: 1970s Glastonbury Headliners!
programme.desc: Since the first festival in 1970, there were only another 2 in the decade - in 1971 & 1979. But these were the acts that headlined & performed, and one that didn't!

programme.title: Punk & Disorderly!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s songs the cool kids were listening to in the latter half of the decade - expect skinny jeans, safety pins, guitars and just a few snarls!

programme.title: Antiques Rockshow with Robin Banks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Antiques Rockshow with Robin Banks
programme.desc: Crammed full with extraordinary finds, hidden treasures, and plenty of old relics! From AC/DC & Led Zep, to Bowie & Black Sabbath - how many of these family heirlooms do you own?

programme.title: Power Pop Day!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & power ballads - all day!

programme.title: Bam's Power Hours! 1970-1979
programme.desc: A 10 hour pentathlon of power - a deafening decade of hits! 130 songs to turn up loud, presented by the only man who can - Bam!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes from the year Richard Nixon left the US Presidency after Watergate, Prog Rock dominated the album charts & inflation hit double digits. Imagine that!

programme.title: Seven Inch Heroes! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 50 songs from the cooler end of the 70s spectrum - designed for repeated plays! From Free to The Police via Thin Lizzy, The Clash & Lene Lovich.

programme.title: Pat Sharp's 40 Guilty Pleasures!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's 40 Guilty Pleasures!
programme.desc: Songs you really like but are a bit too embarrassed to admit. Don't worry, we're all in the same boat here & Pat urges you to try to have a little less shame in your musical game!

programme.title: Groovy Little Numbers!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: The Best 1969 Party - Ever!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Best 1969 Party - Ever!
programme.desc: The year that set the musical agenda for the whole of the next decade. 20 scene setters with songs for every taste, whether you like The Beatles, The Stones or the Archies!

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.desc: Relive the decade of perms and shoulder pads! The unmistakable synth pop sound of artists such as Michael Jackson, George Michael, and Whitney Houston, is bound to remind you of all your greatest '80s memories!

programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #24: Motorsurf World Championship #1
programme.desc: Motorsurf World Championship #1 - Fujairah (UAE) You’ve probably asked yourself many times what to do if you want to surf but the swell isn’t good enough. The athletes from the Motosurf World Championship have the answer. So let´s check out how they performed in Fujairah.

programme.title: 2025 Open Faces Obertauern Challenger - FWQ FINALS - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: Ride Aletsch - Geraldine Fasnacht
programme.desc: In this Episode we accompany Geraldine Fasnacht on her adventure to ride the famous Aletsch Glacier. A lightweight airplane and former Freeride World Tour Champion Emilien Badoux help her to fulfill her dream.

programme.title: Mission Antarctica
programme.desc: Xavier de Le Rue, multiple freeride world champion and two times Olympian returned from a trip to Antarctica with mixed feelings, although he had the experience of a lifetime and discovered a new paradise he believed he had only scratched the surface of it.

programme.title: Winter Games Obsidian - Park Jam
programme.desc: Winter Games NZ is the Southern Hemisphere’s biggest snow sports event. It welcomes the world’s best skiers and snowboarders to compete in the opening of the FIS Park and Pipe World Cup season and The North Face Frontier.

programme.title: Episode 48
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 48

programme.title: X-Project 2.0
programme.desc: X-project 2.0 is a worldwide unique project where different winter sports unite in front of the backdrop of a Swiss dreamscape in the mountains of Engadin valley (Canton of Grisons).

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary - Part 2
programme.desc: Today we will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean. We´ll visit some of the most terrifying and beautiful waves around the globe.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #19: Pasko the Magic Move
programme.desc: Recovering from testicular cancer, professional athlete and filmmaker Maarten Molenaar embarks on a journey to Fuerteventura to learn a new freestyle windsurfing trick - the Pasko.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #25: Profile – Jakob Schubert & Highline Wendestein
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: iQFOiL U23 World Championships - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: Portimão, Portugal, welcomed the world's best windsurfers to the iQFOiL U23 World Championships from September 6 to 13, 2025. The venue is known for its Atlantic winds, waves, and extreme racing conditions that challenge even the most experienced competitors.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 5
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 6
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Final Stage
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: FIA Karting Championship 2019 - Le Mans (FRA)
programme.desc: As an integral part of the FIA, the International Karting Commission (CIK-FIA) regulates worldwide competitions and awards the only official titles of World Champion and European Champion in karting. The FIA Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs - Sibiu (ROM)
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Hard Enduro Rally was launched in 2004 and has become the toughest hard enduro rally in the world, attracting participants from around 50 countries every year. The race promises five days of pure hard enduro racing action

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championship 2019 - Alahärmä (FIN)
programme.desc: The CIK-FIA presents the latest championships, bringing together the best drivers and the greatest hopes of motorsports of the future in races of incredible intensity. The FIA Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over

programme.title: Winter Games 2017 - Freeride Ski & Snowboard - New Zealand
programme.desc: Stunning scenery, world’s best talent and Kiwi hospitality is set to be showcased to a global audience with Winter Games New Zealand revealing its most diverse event yet. Winter Olympic, Paralympic and X Games stars are heading to New Zealand once again.

programme.title: World Rookie Tour 2106/17 - Part 1 - Italy
programme.desc: The World Snowboard Federation (WSF) is the international organization exclusively working to develop the sport of snowboarding at all levels, especially with worldwide events four young and talented riders.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Moscow (RUS)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Snow Bike Festival 2019 - Gstaad (SUI)
programme.desc: The Snow Bike Festival 2019 is THE event of the young snow bike boom and brings together like-minded athletes from all over the world. With the extra wide and grippy wheels you are ready for your exciting ride in the snow.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Hakuba (JPN)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour (FWT) has expanded to Asia! The season opener of the world's most important freeride series for skiers and snowboarders takes place in Hakuba (JPN).

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Deutschnofen (ITA)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Kicking Horse, Golden BC (CAN)
programme.desc: After an epic start to Winter 2019 in Hakuba, Japan, the world's best make their way across the Pacific to North America for the second competition of FWT19 at the legendary Canadian Rockies resort of Kicking Horse, Golden BC.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Championships 2019 - Latzfons (ITA)
programme.desc: Im Gegensatz zu künstlichen Rodelbahnen bestehenden Naturbahnen aus Bergstraßen und -wegen. Naturbahnrodeln erfordert eine völlig andere Technik als auf einer Kunstbahn. Im Ziel entscheiden Hundertstelsekunden über Sieg oder Niederlage.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: With two events in the pipeline and a fiercely competitive race for the world title quickly unfolding, the best in the world will get their chance to “Hold The Line” in Fieberbrunn as FWT19 enters the European leg of the season.

programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Ordino Arcalis (AND)
programme.desc: It's that time of the season again when points mean everything: racing for the world title, qualifying for the final in Verbier and the 2020 season. The stage is set for what is sure to be a hard-fought competition in Ordino Arcalís
